title: I CANNOT LOG IN TO LEAGUE OF LEGENDS GET IT TOGETHER
body:
seriously? why the fuck is this happening? riot why? this is stupid u say u have to fix north america servers yet i am currently in discord yet cannot login to league, no lag on discord no lag on safari that is all i have open and i am making my friend LOSE A GAME. 

my friends are saying the same thing, I only DC to reconnect to my game and i cannot -__- what the fuck?

replies.body:
Turns out that we were able to fix that weird patcher loop issue that was plaguing us overnight, only to be hit with some login servers issues -_-....

We've got the devs looking into it, and you can be sure to get the latest updates by checking out the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).
ok, I'm having less spikes now, but still a few at times :( they don't last long but i let my support die because of it :( ill keep checking the status page to see.
It's Saturday so no one still working
